stwf:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
stwf:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

stwf:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
stwf:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
stwf:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

stwf:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
stwf:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

stwf:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
stwf:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !stwf:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

stwf:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
stwf:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !stwf:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
